security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The skill is a legitimate workflow orchestration system for document processing. Scanner flagged SHA256 hashes as C2/weak crypto (they are secure hashes for file integrity), and documentation code examples in SKILL.md as command execution (they are markdown references, not code). No malicious patterns confirmed.

content.user_title: Coordinate Agent Workflows with Plan-First Approach
content.value_statement: Managing complex multi-agent projects requires coordination across team members. This skill orchestrates Pukaist agents with a strict plan-first workflow, ensuring every task is approved before execution and maintaining system integrity through automated testing.
actual_capabilities: Orchestrates 6 specialized Pukaist agents (Gatekeeper, Analyst, Scribe, Archivist, Historian, Barrister)
Enforces plan-first workflow requiring user approval before any task execution
Runs automated integrity tests to verify system health and stability
Performs system audits checking log consistency, queue health, and output validation
Delegates tasks to specific agents based on workflow requirements
Maintains quality control standards including verbatim citation and neutral voice requirements
limitations: Designed specifically for Pukaist system integration, may not work with other agent frameworks
Requires the full Pukaist agent ecosystem to function (6 specialized agents)
Cannot execute tasks without a user-approved plan; always requires human approval
Limited to document processing workflows; not a general-purpose project management tool

use_cases.title: Manage Document Review Pipelines
use_cases.description: Coordinate document ingestion, OCR processing, evidence extraction, and legal brief synthesis across multiple specialized agents with quality checkpoints.
use_cases.target_user: Legal operations teams managing high-volume document review projects

use_cases.title: System Health Monitoring
use_cases.description: Run comprehensive system audits that verify queue integrity, log consistency, and output quality across all active agents in the workflow.
use_cases.target_user: System administrators overseeing automated document processing systems

use_cases.title: Multi-Phase Project Coordination
use_cases.description: Break down complex projects into atomic steps, present plans for approval, and delegate to specialized agents while tracking progress through the pipeline.
use_cases.target_user: Project managers coordinating cross-functional teams with defined workflows

prompt_templates.title: Start New Document Review
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to process a new batch of documents through the review pipeline. Start by assessing the current system state, then present a plan for me to approve.
prompt_templates.scenario: Initial document batch intake and workflow initiation

prompt_templates.title: Run System Health Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check the system health. Run the integrity tests and health check commands. Report any issues found and suggest fixes.
prompt_templates.scenario: Routine system maintenance and stability verification

prompt_templates.title: Audit Agent Outputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a deep audit of recent agent outputs. Check that all files have valid citations, neutral language, and proper provenance logging.
prompt_templates.scenario: Quality assurance review of completed work

prompt_templates.title: Delegate Complex Task
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to complete a complex multi-step task. Please break it down into atomic steps with the appropriate agent assignments, then wait for my approval before proceeding.

output_examples.input: I need to process 50 new contracts through the review system.
output_examples.output:
I'll start by checking the current system state and reviewing recent activity.

**System Assessment:**
- Review Log has 234 entries, Primary Records has 247 files (checking for orphans)
- Queue health: 3 items InProgress, oldest is 12 hours old
- No flagged tasks currently

**Proposed Plan:**
1. Gatekeeper ingests all 50 files, assigns StableIDs
2. Scribe performs OCR on any non-text files
3. Analyst extracts evidence from each contract
4. Archivist consolidates findings into Master Dossier
5. Historian updates Chronology
6. Barrister synthesizes into Thematic Brief

Please review and approve this plan, or let me know if you want any steps modified before I begin.

**System Audit Report**

1. Log Consistency: PASSED (no orphans found)
2. Queue Health: PASSED (no stalled tasks)
3. Output Sampling: PASSED (3 files reviewed, all have valid citations)
4. Communication Audit: PASSED (all agents using valid status codes)

System is working as intended. No issues detected.

best_practices: Always wait for user approval before delegating tasks; the plan-first approach prevents wasted work and ensures alignment.
Run integrity tests before major operations to ensure the system is stable and ready to process tasks.
Use bounded snapshots and targeted reads rather than dumping entire documents to maintain efficiency.
anti_patterns: Never start implementing a task immediately without presenting a plan first; this violates the core workflow principle.
Do not rely on a single sample when validating outputs; sample multiple files across different categories.
Avoid letting tasks stall in InProgress status for more than 24 hours without intervention.

faq.question: What is the Pukaist system?
faq.answer: Pukaist is a multi-agent document processing system with 6 specialized agents. This skill coordinates those agents to ensure proper workflow execution.

faq.question: Can I skip the planning phase?
faq.answer: No. The plan-first approach is a core design principle. You must always draft and get approval before any agent executes tasks.

faq.question: What happens if integrity tests fail?
faq.answer: If any test fails, you must stop all operations and fix the underlying issue before proceeding with any task execution.

faq.question: How do I add new agents to the system?
faq.answer: This skill manages the existing 6 Pukaist agents. Adding new agents would require updates to the agent roster in the skill documentation.

faq.question: What quality standards are enforced?
faq.answer: All outputs must have valid citations, neutral language (no opinions), and verifiable provenance. This ensures legal-grade documentation.

faq.question: How do I recover from a stalled queue?
faq.answer: Check Flagged_Tasks.tsv for errors. For items stuck in InProgress, review the Agent_Communication_Log to identify the blocker, then take corrective action.
